xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: A module for performing date and time operations
Returns the xs:date portion of an xs:dateTime
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $date-time The dateTime to extract the date from.

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Returns the xs:time portion of an xs:dateTime.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $date-time The dateTime to extract the time from.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: xs:time : the time extracted from the date-time

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Returns the day in the week of the date. Result is in the range 1 to 7, where 1 = Sunday, 7 = Saturday.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $date The date to extract the day in the week from.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: xs:integer : the day in the week of the date in the range 1 to 7, where 1 = Sunday, 7 = Saturday.

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Returns the week in the month of the date.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $date The date to extract the week in the month from.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: xs:integer : the week in the month of the date

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: datetime:count-day-in-month
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: datetime:count-day-in-month($weekday as xs:integer, $date as xs:date) as xs:integer

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Returns the count of a specific weekday in a month from the given date. For example it can tell you there are 5 Fridays in February 2008.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $weekday The day of the week in the range of 1 to 7 where 1 = Sunday and 7 = Saturday.
$date The day that will identify the month to get the count of the number of occurrences of a given weekday
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: xs:integer : The number of occurrences of the weekday in the selected month.

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Returns the number of days in the month of the date.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $date The date for extracting the number of days in the month component.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: xs:integer : the number of days in the given month.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: datetime:format-dateTime
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: datetime:format-dateTime($date-time as xs:dateTime, $simple-date-format as xs:string) as xs:string

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Returns a xs:string of the xs:dateTime according to the SimpleDateFormat format.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $date-time The dateTime to to be formatted.
$simple-date-format The format string according to the Java java.text.SimpleDateFormat class

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: datetime:format-date
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: datetime:format-date($date as xs:date, $simple-date-format as xs:string) as xs:string

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Returns a xs:string of the xs:date formatted according to the SimpleDateFormat format.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $date The date to to be formatted.
$simple-date-format The format string according to the Java java.text.SimpleDateFormat class

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: datetime:format-time
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: datetime:format-time($time as xs:time, $simple-date-format as xs:string) as xs:string

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Returns a xs:string of the xs:time formatted according to the SimpleDateFormat format.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $time The time to to be formatted.
$simple-date-format The format string according to the Java java.text.SimpleDateFormat class

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: datetime:parse-dateTime
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: datetime:parse-dateTime($dateTime-string as xs:string, $simple-date-format as xs:string) as xs:dateTime

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Returns an xs:dateTime of the xs:string parsed according to the SimpleDateFormat format.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $dateTime-string The date and time to to be parsed.
$simple-date-format The format string according to the Java java.text.SimpleDateFormat class

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: datetime:parse-date
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: datetime:parse-date($date-string as xs:string, $simple-date-format as xs:string) as xs:date

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Returns an xs:date of the xs:string parsed according to the SimpleDateFormat format.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $date-string The date to to be parsed.
$simple-date-format The format string according to the Java java.text.SimpleDateFormat class

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: datetime:parse-time
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: datetime:parse-time($time-string as xs:string, $simple-date-format as xs:string) as xs:time

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Returns an xs:time of the xs:string parsed according to the SimpleDateFormat format.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $time-string The time to to be parsed.
$simple-date-format The format string according to the Java java.text.SimpleDateFormat class

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: datetime:date-for
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: datetime:date-for($year as xs:integer, $month as xs:integer, $week as xs:integer, $weekday as xs:integer) as xs:date

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Returns the date for a given set of parameters.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $year The year of interest
$month The month of interest (1 = January, 12 = December)
$week The week in the month of interest (1 = first week, 4 or 5 = last week)
$weekday The day in the week of interest (1 = Sunday, 7 = Saturday)
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: xs:date : the date generated from the parameters.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: datetime:datetime-range
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: datetime:datetime-range($start-date-time as xs:dateTime, $increment as xs:duration, $iterations as xs:integer) as xs:dateTime*

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Generates a range of xs:dateTime values, incremented cumulatively by a fixed duration from a start xs:dateTime
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $start-date-time The dateTime to start at.
$increment The duration increment.
$iterations The number of increments to generate.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: datetime:date-range
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: datetime:date-range($start-date as xs:date, $increment as xs:duration, $iterations as xs:integer) as xs:date*

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Generates a range of xs:date values, incremented cumulatively by a fixed duration from a start xs:date
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $start-date The date to start at.
$increment The duration increment.
$iterations The number of increments to generate.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: datetime:time-range
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: datetime:time-range($start-time as xs:time, $increment as xs:dayTimeDuration, $iterations as xs:integer) as xs:time*

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Generates a range of xs:time values, incremented cumulatively by a fixed duration from a start xs:time
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $start-time The time to start at.
$increment The duration increment.
$iterations The number of increments to generate.

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: The current time as UTC milliseconds since the Epoch.
Return the number of UTC milliseconds since the Epoch for given date-time value.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $date-time The dateTime to be converted.

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Return the date-time from value of number of UTC milliseconds since the Epoch.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $ms The number of UTC milliseconds since the Epoch.
